column4: why does my computer freeze when transfering music from an sd card? It always freezes after about 50 or so mb
Does the copying stop or does the entire GUI freeze (can't even move the mouse)?

That doesn't solve the problem, but it's at least better than pulling the plug untill this gets properly fixed. When the GUI freezes have you tried pressing ctrl+alt+F1 to get to a terminal? (ctrl+alt+F7 to get back)

It depends on how comfortable you are with the terminal. Just knowing if you could get to a terminal or not would give more information about how bad the crash is. Have you noticed the caps lock blinking when the crash happens?
